about_the_game:
Experience an old-school atmosphere in a brand new battler with strategy and RPG elements!

If you've been playing tactical RPGs and turn-based strategy games of the fantasy genre (Final Fantasy Tactics, Heroes of the Sword of Magic, Eador or Disciples), then FANTASY HEARTS is the multiplayer game that will make you feel unreal nostalgic.

ALL THE CLASSICS

✔ PvP battles

✔ PvE battles

✔ Hex field

✔ Fantasy characters

The world of FANTASY HEARTS is inhabited by different races. In our universe, humans, beasts, elves, goblins, and the undead often fight side by side.

POWERFUL HEROES

There are 25 characters represented, and each has unique characteristics and skills to consider when planning your battle strategy.

CHOOSE YOUR STRATEGY

In our fantasy RPG game, you can recruit into your squad:

✔ Humans

✔ Elves

✔ Monsters

✔ Goblins

And even raise the dead

EPIC BATTLES IN MULTIPLAYER MODE

You'll have to assemble a squad of 4-5 units and experimentally find out which team can bring victory. You can start by practicing, sharpening your tactics, trying different combinations, and then try your hand in the arena, pitting your squad against other players.

CUSTOMIZE YOUR ARMY

If you want to see your name at the top of the rankings, you'll have to defeat as many opponents as possible.

But a good squad is not a guarantee of success. The battlefield also holds a lot of surprises. The terrain will allow fighters to take cover from enemy fire, and those who sow fire - to take a more comfortable position.

PvP Battles

We all know - “One is not a warrior in the field”. So it's up to you to join an existing guild and earn the respect of the players or create your own guild.

PARTICIPATE IN TIME EVENTS

When you've defeated all the opponents, it's worth going to the Tavern. There you can not only relax and chat with other players over a beer, but also get a daily quest or recruit a couple of mercenaries.

You have a unique opportunity to become one of the pioneers of this world. You can try to top the rankings while there are not so many rivals, explore the world among the first or hunt for bugs!

The world of Fantasy Hearts is waiting for you!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 x64 or Later
  • Processor: 1.7 GHz Dual Core with x64 support
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics:
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

short_description: FANTASY HEARTS is a new old-school fantasy tactical battler with PvP and PvE hex-based battles. Battle for victory by assembling a squad of 25 unique heroes. Customize your strategy, train in epic multiplayer battles and conquer the top rankings!
supported_languages:
Russian*, English, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Polish, Portuguese - Portugal, Turkish, Japanese
*languages with full audio support
